title: Italy may have hit Europe's hottest day on record as anticyclone 'Lucifer' sweeps in
content:
1. Italy may have hit Europe's hottest day on record as anticyclone 'Lucifer' sweeps in  CNN
  2. Italy may have registered Europe's hottest temperature on record  BBC News
  3. Flames stretch across Sicily hills as wildfires rage in southern Italy  Global News
  4. OPINION: Bargain homes and fewer crowds - but Italy's deep south is not for everyone  The Local Italy
  5. Sicily may have set Europe heat record  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Italy may have hit Europe's hottest day on record as anticyclone 'Lucifer' sweeps in  CNN
Italy may have registered Europe's hottest temperature on record  BBC News
Flames stretch across Sicily hills as wildfires rage in southern Italy  Global News
OPINION: Bargain homes and fewer crowds - but Italy's deep south is not for everyone  The Local Italy
Sicily may have set Europe heat record  The Washington Post

localize.title: 高気圧「ルシファー」の襲来により、イタリアはヨーロッパで記録的な暑さになったかもしれない
反气旋 "路西法 "席卷而来，意大利可能创下欧洲有史以来最热的一天
反氣旋 "路西法 "席捲而來，意大利可能創下歐洲有史以來最熱的一天
